itemDescription: Member of the House of Lords (born 1949)

wikipedia_page.main: Margaret Eileen Joyce Wheeler, Baroness Wheeler MBE (born 25 March 1949) is a Labour member of the House of Lords who is an Opposition Whip.In the 2005 Birthday Honours she was appointed a Member of the Order of the British Empire (MBE) for services to Trade Unions.She was created a life peer on 20 June 2010 taking the title Baroness Wheeler, of Blackfriars in the City of London, and was introduced in the Lords on 14 July 2010.
